snippet: EJ Manuel will start at quarterback for the Buffalo Bills on Sunday, but interim head coach Anthony Lynn made it clear the decision to bench Tyrod Taylor in the season finale came from the front office....
lead_paragraph: EJ Manuel will start at quarterback for the Buffalo Bills on Sunday, but interim head coach Anthony Lynn made it clear the decision to bench Tyrod Taylor in the season finale came from the front office.

headline.main: Interim Bills Coach Says Benching QB Taylor Business Decision
headline.print_headline: Interim Bills Coach Says Benching QB Taylor Business Decision
